SkillsWithBio.Bio: Brilliant heister and tinkerer. Caught in a recent job due to bad contingency planning.
A charismatic automaton with a corrupted directive. Went on a killing spree and was stopped.
Eccentric pirate of the Outer Reef. Their rising ambitions got them betrayed by their crew.
A nefarious cyborg leading gruesome experiments. Was caught along with their boss.
An eel farmer turned illegal weapons manufacturer. Was caught by an infiltrator.
Explorer and scientist with no sense of ethics. Caught scouring secret royal laboratories.
Part of a sect, they blew up industrial lines. They were traced by forensics and arrested.
Violent psychopath from the Brassport District. Local enforcement neutralized them.
Opera singer by day, drug trade overseer by night. They were double-crossed by trade partners.
A diver who claims to have seen monstrosities in the depths. Jailed for fear-mongering.
